25/* Look up a program in the PATH.
26 Attempt to determine the pathname that would be called by execlp/execvp
27 of PROGNAME. If successful, return a pathname containing a slash
28 (either absolute or relative to the current directory). Otherwise,
29 return PROGNAME unmodified.
30 Because of the latter case, callers should use execlp/execvp, not
31 execl/execv on the returned pathname.
32 The returned string is freshly malloc()ed if it is != PROGNAME. */
33extern const char *find_in_path (const char *progname);
34
35
36#ifdef __cplusplus
37}
38#endif
39
